dcterms:description: The SROIE dataset consists of 1000 scanned receipts, which are annotated with key invoice parameters such as company name, address, date, and total amount. The dataset is split into training, validation, and test sets, with 876 receipts used for training and 347 for validation/testing.
dcterms:title: SROIE Dataset
